http://www.tsm-resources.com/alists/pow2.html

0  = 1
1  = 2
2  = 4
3  = 8
4  = 16
5  = 32
6  = 64				Importantes:
7  = 128
8  = 256		!		2^8  = 256
9  = 512				2^10 = 1024
10 = 1024		!		2^12 = 4096
11 = 2048				2^16 = 65.536
12 = 4096		!		2^32 = 4.294.967.296
13 = 8192				2^64 = 18.446.744.073.709.551.615
14 = 16 384
15 = 32 768
16 = 65 536		!
17 = 131 072
18 = 262 144
19 = 524 288
20 = 1 048 576
21 = 2 097 152
22 = 4 194 304
23 = 8 388 608
24 = 16 777 216
25 = 33 554 432
26 = 67 108 864
27 = 134 217 728
28 = 268 435 456
29 = 536 870 912
30 = 1 073 741 824
31 = 2 147 483 648
32 = 4 294 967 296	!
